sentence.Network_en: This lake of the Kazak people's sufferings has, today, become the symbol of their prosperity.
sentence.Network_cn: 山峦爽朗,湖水清净, 日里披满阳光, 夜里缀满星辰.

sentence.Network_en: Dongbula is a plucked stringed instrument of the Kazak ethnic group.
sentence.Network_cn: 冬不拉哈萨克族弹拨乐器.

sentence.Network_en: Shouzhua mutton is the Uygur, Kazak, Kirgiz people Changshi a meat products.
sentence.Network_cn: 手抓羊肉是维吾尔族 、 哈萨克族 、 柯尔克孜族常食的一种肉食品.

means.word_mean: 1. a Muslim who is a member of a Turkic people of western Asia (especially in Kazakstan)
2. a landlocked republic south of Russia and northeast of the Caspian Sea; the original Turkic-speaking inhabitants were overrun by Mongols in the 13th century; an Asian soviet from 1936 to 1991
3. the Turkic language spoken by the Kazak people
